thread.title: Bland Co and Giles remain undefeated with Monday night wins
thread.title_full: Bland Co and Giles remain undefeated with Monday night wins

author: A.J. Good
title: Bland Co and Giles remain undefeated with Monday night wins
text: Bland Co and Giles remain undefeated with Monday night wins Bluefield, WVWVVA-TVBoth Bland Co and Giles Co improved to 5-0 with wins on Monday night. Bland Co defeated Montcalm 42-12, and Giles knocked off Galax 35-23. The Bears are off to the best start in school history. Giles has gone to 5-0 for the 4th year in a row. Up next, Bland will play at Narrows on Saturday. Giles will travel to Glenvar on Saturday. More >> Bluefield, WVWVVA-TVBoth Bland Co and Giles Co improved to 5-0 with wins on Monday night. Bland Co defeated Montcalm 42-12, and Giles knocked off Galax 35-23. The Bears are off to the best start in school history. Giles has gone to 5-0 for the 4th year in a row.
